Articles.Content: ive seen youtubers remove the staging from the Pomogranete and other circular pods but now i cant tho

Advanced Tweakables?

In my VAB (1.4.3, stock with Better Burn Time), there's a "Decoupler: Disable Staging" button on the Pomegranate.  If you don't have that, you need to go into Settings and make sure "advanced tweakables" is turned on.
